title: Executive Order 5745-Power-Site Restoration No. 466, Wyoming
content: So much of the orders of May 26, 1909, creating Temporary Power-Site Withdrawal No. 5, July 21, 1909, creating Temporary Power-Site Withdrawal No. 30, and July 2, 1910, creating Power-Site Reserves Nos. 5 and 30, as affects the lands hereinafter described, is hereby revoked:
T. 35 N., R. Ill W., sec. 8, S ½ NE. ¼, NE. ¼ SE. ¼.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5745-Power-Site Restoration No. 466, Wyoming Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361315
